entity.label: Account name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Account name should be between 1 and 50
Account name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.label: Client ID
entity.help: Enter the Client ID for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Client ID should be between 1 and 200

entity.label: Client Secret
entity.help: Enter the Client Secret for this account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of Client Secret should be between 1 and 8192
Max host length is 4096
Max length of username is 50
Max length of password is 8192

options.saveValidator: function(formData) { if(!formData.proxy_enabled || formData.proxy_enabled === '0') {return true; } if(!formData.proxy_url) { return 'Proxy Host can not be empty'; } if(!formData.proxy_port) { return 'Proxy Port can not be empty'; } return true; }

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.

entity.help: a.k.a. Directory ID

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Start Date
entity.help: The date/time to start collecting data.  If no value is give, the input will start getting data 24 hours in the past.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Query Limit (optional)
entity.help: Specify the maximum number of minutes used for the query range.  This is useful for retrieving older data. Use this setting with caution.  Specify '0' to disable.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Query Backoff Throttle
entity.help: Advanced: number of seconds to subtract from the end date of the query. This helps accommodate near real-time events toward the end of a query that may arrive non sequentially.

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192
